alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 24 at 3:56PM PST until March 01 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Total snow accumulations of 10 to 30 inches possible, locally higher amounts up to 4 feet above 3500 feet. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County and Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County Counties. * WHEN...Late Saturday night through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels 2000 to 3000 feet Sunday falling to 1500 to 2500 feet Monday. Light to moderate snow Sunday with snow showers lingering into Sunday night. A second round of heavier snow is expected Monday into early Wednesday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
